title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dr. Simone Gold & Rep. Louie Gohmert | 7/30/20
description:
Rebecca Friedrichs, founder and president of For Kids and Country, discusses how teachers’ unions are embracing Marxism and going after private schools. America’s Frontline Doctors founder Dr. Simone Gold gives the perspective on hydroxychloroquine and free speech that social media has purged. Rep. Louie Gohmert joins to discuss contracting COVID-19, being bashed for not wearing a mask, and the craziness in Congress.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
